metadata.title: CVE-2021-39906 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Improper validation of ipynb files in GitLab CE/EE version 13.5 and aboveallows an attacker to execute arbitrary JavaScript code on the victim'sbehalf.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
